job.title: Founding Software Engineer
job.description: pstronguAbout UsustrongppSweat Equity Ventures is a VC firm with a new model of investing meant to massively accelerate momentum and value We supercharge founding teams with worldclass talent in goto market business amp product strategy pricing sales operations and recruiting Our experts have built teams driven growth priced new SaaS offerings and built monetization for generational companies such as MongoDB LinkedIn Salesforce Uber Facebook and othersppbrppstronguJob OpportunityustrongppWe are looking for software engineers to be part of the founding team at one of our startups Desired subject matter expertise vary across areas such as web mobile distributed systems and MLppbrppOur team focuses on forming and scaling technology startups innovating in areas such as Blockchain GovTech Education Productivity Zero Code Platforms Collaboration Security FinTech Machine Learning Internet of Things etc These companies range from early stage to growth stage startupsppbrppThese are FTE positions with our portfolio companies which range in industry and size The opportunities range from 100 remote friendly to being based in locations such as San Francisco Palo Alto and SeattleppbrppstronguResponsibilitiesustrongpulliPartner closely with founders on finding product market fitliliWork in a highly collaborative fastpaced startup environmentnbspliliArchitect and lead the development of software systems from the ground upliliHelp hire and mentor new engineersliliSample technologies include Typescript Reactjs Vuejs Nodejs GraphQL Swift Web Assembly Kubernetes Docker AWS varies based on the company and roleliulpbrppstronguApplication ProcessustrongppWe will contact individuals as soon as we identify a potential match Once contacted a member of our team will explain our VC recruiting model get to know you better and share relevant startup opportunities within our portfolio with youp
